item.title: StockFutures Gain as More Bank Earnings Loom
item.description: Stock futures were are ticking higher amid another round of bank earnings and December retail sales.

item.title: Wall Street Thinks U.S. Homes Are Overpriced
item.description: Housing could be overvalued by anywhere from 10% to 25% based on how investors are acting.

item.title: What Happens When Your House Burns Down and You Still Have a Mortgage?
item.description: Borrowers are still on the hook but might be able to pause payments.
